pullrequest.title: Add RPYXYZ parser for projector pose

content.raw: Is this related to [intrinsic/extrinsic rotation of Euler angles](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Euler_angles#Intrinsic_rotations)? I had similar issue with DART and Gazebo. They uses different definition of Euler angles; DART uses intrinsic rotation and Gazebo uses extrinsic rotation. [I added parsing code for sdf parser in DART](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/commit/e2979a6b39f54d3964c04fdf007ea88787af9d49).
content.html: Is this related to intrinsic/extrinsic rotation of Euler angles? I had similar issue with DART and Gazebo. They uses different definition of Euler angles; DART uses intrinsic rotation and Gazebo uses extrinsic rotation. I added parsing code for sdf parser in DART.
